title: Why does the Google app crash when I say (or type) "Read me my messages"?
content:
I would like my phone to read out my text messages when my hands are not free.  saying, "read me my e-mail messages" works fine, but only when asking for my text messages.  I'm currently using android messages (and it's my default messaging app).  the only messaging apps I have are facebook messages and hangouts.  i have the latest version of all apps and pixel updates.
thanks!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
